item.title: High Rank Path Development: an approach to learning the filtration of stochastic processes
item.description: High-Rank PCF-GAN uses a novel metric (HRPCFD) based on high-rank path development to learn filtration of stochastic processes, outperforming state-of-the-art methods in hypothesis testing and time-se…
